ygData.subject: I am a Gm giving out free items
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi fellow Norrathians. I am Guide Deamer from the Quellious server.... Due to illegal actions upon myself, I am under investigation by Verant. This has caused
ygData.messageBody:
Hi fellow Norrathians. I am Guide Deamer from the
Quellious server.... Due to illegal actions upon myself, I
am under investigation by Verant. This has caused me
great distress because I have been accused of many
things that I did not do. I am under investigation for
only 3 months, and then they will decide if my actions
were bad enough to boot me from the program... Here's
my deal to you...<br><br> You may send me your
Station Name and Password to my email address, along with
the server you are playing on, and I will give all
your characters what I see fit. If you like, you may
include an exact list of what you want put on this
character...<br><br> Now, I know this may sound too good to be true, but
Verant has really pissed me off this time, and I will be
booted in 3 months anyway... You don't have much time to
waste... Please Email me at this address, and I will
accomplish what I've always wanted to do... Get back at
Verant, along with you, getting the best things in the
game for free... Doesn't matter much to me, but if you
want to be uber, follow my directions,,,, It'll be
done within the night.... Being, and having a GM
character, I can switch from server to server, so this can
apply to EVERYONE...<br><br>Thank you for you support
in my endeavour....<br><br>Asst. Guide Akiambo of
the quellious Server...<br><br>Email at:
Quellious_GM_Deamer@...
